mapper.select: SELECT id,parent_id,name,type*1 as type,agency_id,area,area_code,far_area from m_region where parent_id = #{parentId};

SELECT a.*,r1.`name` as province_name,r2.`name` as city_name,r3.`name` as district_name from m_address a LEFT JOIN m_region r1 ON r1.id = a.province_id LEFT JOIN m_region r2 ON r2.id = a.city_id LEFT JOIN m_region r3 ON r3.id = a.area_id where a.user_id = #{userId};
select * from m_address where user_id = #{userId} and id = 0 limit 1;
mapper.update: UPDATE m_address set is_delete = 1 where id = #{id};

UPDATE m_address set name = #{name},user_id = #{user_id},province_id = #{province_id},city_id = #{city_id},area_id = #{district_id},address = #{address},mobile = #{mobile},is_default = #{is_default} where id = #{id};
